verbs.description: Some presidents [V: have] used their pardon authority in controversial ways , but Donald Trump is abusing his power in ways without precedent .
[ARG0: Some presidents] have [V: used] [ARG1: their pardon authority] [ARGM-MNR: in controversial ways] , but Donald Trump is abusing his power in ways without precedent .
Some presidents have used their pardon authority in controversial ways , but Donald Trump [V: is] abusing his power in ways without precedent .
Some presidents have used their pardon authority in controversial ways , but [ARG0: Donald Trump] is [V: abusing] [ARG1: his power] [ARGM-MNR: in ways without precedent] .
